name: Friendly Flappers
description:
THE BEST GAME ON THE PLANET!
Easy to play, HARD to master! Your life will be taken control by this bird! Don't let the bird fall or hit the obstacles!
Little Birdie needs your help! Help the Flappy Bird fly!

How to play?
Just tap tap tap and make the birdie fly. Be careful don't hit the obstacles.

More modifications are being added currently to make Friendly Flappers even more fun and addicting!

---Levels Coming Soon.
